name: BulletBoi
description:
Dodge, Shoot, and Loot your way through the dungeon.
Defeat all the monsters to exit each room.
Progress through the map and pick up upgrades along the way.
Grab the key and enter the portal to advance to the next dungeon.

Controls:
    •WASD or ARROW KEYS to move
    •Aim with MOUSE and CLICK to shoot
    •RIGHT CLICK to dodge or hold to ram
    •Q and E to change between weapons (you have to obtain them first though)

Angry Banana 2021

*Contains Flashing Lights
also, sorry no sound
updates coming soon
